name: Cecil Smith and The Lost Treasures of King Tutti
name_original: Cecil Smith and The Lost Treasures of King Tutti
description:
Delve into the Ancient Pyramids and retrieve the precious artifact of the mask of King Tutti.

Controls

Arrow Keys to Move/Attack/Interact Numbers 1-9 to use items from inventory.

A short game made in 72 Hrs for Alakajam 11 - Ancient Ruins
